enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 101-0 03.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: WCAS CHEM 121-0-03 General Chemistry Laboratory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Chemical analysis of real samples using basic laboratory techniques, including titration, colorimetric analysis, density measurements, and atomic spectroscopy. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on these experiments. Must be taken concurrently with Chem 101-0.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Students enrolled in Chemistry 101-0 MUST also enroll in Chemistry 121-0.
Students enrolled in Chemistry 121-0 MUST also enroll in Chemistry 101-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Electronic Lab Notebook (details to be provided in course syllabus) ($30)
2. Turning Technologies Model QT or NXT "Clicker" and associated 1 year license ($55.00 new; $41.25 used)*
3. Approved laboratory safety eyewear ($10)
4. 100% Cotton laboratory coat ($45)

Items 3 and 4 will be sold during the first week of classes. Details TBA.

*Prices as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 6/23/16. Prices offered by other vendors may be lower.

subject: CHEM
